name: Dashie's House
description:
This isn't the whole finished game I'm still working on it but basically you are an intruder in dashie's house and you have to stay till 6 am to leave his house. 

some people are having trouble with the screen border I'm working on it

Controls

Close closet: SHIFT

Bottom Button is for monitor and side button is to close the monitor

PS. CLOSE THE CLOSET WHEN YOU SEE DASHIE NOT BEFORE
